code: import Joi from"joi";import validation from"./validation";var loginSchema=Joi.object({email:Joi.string().email({tlds:{allow:false}}).required(),password:Joi.string().pattern(new RegExp(/^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)(?=.*[!@#$%^&*-])[A-Za-z\d!@#$%^&*-]{6,}$/)).messages({"string.pattern.base":"the password should be...","string.empty":"password must be filled with something that you will forget"}).min(2).max(20).required()});var validateLogin=function validateLogin(inputToCheck){return validation(loginSchema,inputToCheck);};export{validateLogin};
